layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x18 [color=#000080] [bgcolor=#FFFF00]
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 243x18
          text run at (0,0) width 243: "The entire viewport should be yellow."
